mean_cn: n. 创新，革新，新设施，新发明
mean_en: the act or process of introducing new ideas, devices, or methods
word_etyma: in进入 + nov新 + ation名词后缀 → innovation 创新
short_phrase: Solar power is a new innovation.
sentence: The age of innovation is upon us! Hurry up with my dinner!
sentence_trans: 我们正在步入一个创新的时代。赶快把朕的晚餐做好端上来~~~
